eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A BLUE ALERT FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: North Carolina; AT 09:17 PM ON OCT 29, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 01:17 AM OCT 30, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is a North Carolina Blue Alert for an injured officer. The Craven County Sheriff's Office is searching for DOMINIC LIAM CONNELLY.  He is a 24 year old WHITE MALE, approximately 5 feet, 5 inches tall, weighing 135 pounds. DOMINIC LIAM CONNELLY has BLUE EYES and BLONDE HAIR. Last seen wearing A DARK COLORED SHIRT AND DARK COLORED PANTS. IF SIGHTED,  Do not approach. Call 9-1-1.
